summary: This is an email chain from July 2019 where an individual requests an FBI 302 report regarding Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and any statements he made. A follow-up reminder is sent a few days later.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the requested FBI 302 report regarding his arrest and statements.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest
events.description: The arrest of Jeffrey Epstein, which is the subject of the requested FBI 302 report.

keyFacts: An FBI 302 report regarding Jeffrey Epstein's arrest was requested in July 2019.
The request specifically asked for the report to include any statements made by Epstein.
The email indicates an ongoing investigative or legal interest in the details of Epstein's arrest at that time.
